name: portfolio-optimization
description: Optimización del portafolio con CSS modular y minificación

scripts.build: npm run minify-css && npm run optimize-images
scripts.minify-css: cleancss -o css/base.min.css css/base.css && cleancss -o css/layout.min.css css/layout.css && cleancss -o css/navigation.min.css css/navigation.css && cleancss -o css/components.min.css css/components.css && cleancss -o css/animations.min.css css/animations.css

author: Ismael Salazar
